entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 03:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: ENE 69 km/h gust 86 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then northeast 70 gusting to 100 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to rain or freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to snow and blowing snow in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
